advancements.arcanus.all_spells.descript: Craft a Wand and collect all 8 Spell Books.
advancements.arcanus.all_spells.title: Unlimited Power!
advancements.arcanus.arcane_barrier.desc: Find the Arcane Barrier Spell Book in a dungeon.
advancements.arcanus.discombobulate.desc: Find the Discombobulate Spell Book in a dungeon.
advancements.arcanus.dream_warp.descript: Find the Dream Warp Spell Book in a dungeon.
advancements.arcanus.dream_warp.title: There's No Place Like Home...
advancements.arcanus.heal.description: Find the Heal Spell Book in a dungeon.
advancements.arcanus.heal.title: Tis but a scratch!
advancements.arcanus.lunge.description: Find the Lunge Spell Book in a dungeon.
advancements.arcanus.lunge.title: I am become Froge, Savior of Worlds
advancements.arcanus.magic_missile.descr: Find the Magic Missile Spell Book in a dungeon.
advancements.arcanus.magic_missile.title: A Wizard's Best Friend
advancements.arcanus.solar_strike.descri: Find the Solar Strike Spell Book in a dungeon.
advancements.arcanus.solar_strike.title: That Lucky Old Sun
advancements.arcanus.telekinetic_shock.d: Find the Telekinetic Shock Spell Book in a dungeon.
arcanus.midnightconfig.arcaneBarrierCast: The Mana cost for the Arcane Barrier spell.
arcanus.midnightconfig.baseBurnoutCooldo: The time Burnout takes to reduce by 1 in ticks before modifiers.
arcanus.midnightconfig.baseManaCooldown: The time Mana takes to refill by 1 in ticks before modifiers.
arcanus.midnightconfig.discombobulateCas: The Mana cost for the Discombobulate spell.
arcanus.midnightconfig.dreamWarpCastingC: The Mana cost for the Dream Warp spell.
arcanus.midnightconfig.excludeStructures: Bookshelf Structure Processor will not run on these structures.
Lectern Structure Processor will not run on these structures.
arcanus.midnightconfig.healCastingCost: The Mana cost for the Heal spell.
arcanus.midnightconfig.lungeCastingCost: The Mana cost for the Lunge spell.
arcanus.midnightconfig.magicColour: The color of objects created by spells.
arcanus.midnightconfig.magicMissileCasti: The Mana cost for the Magic Missile spell.
arcanus.midnightconfig.solarStrikeCastin: The Mana cost for the Solar Strike spell.
arcanus.midnightconfig.telekinesisCastin: The Mana cost for the Telekinetic Shock spell.
arcanus.midnightconfig.title: Arcanus: Legacy
book.arcanus.arcane_barrier.description: Building is overrated. In this house we use pillars made of magical energy to keep the monsters out.
book.arcanus.arcane_barrier.title: Arcane Barrier Spell Book
book.arcanus.discombobulate.description:
Severely mess with your enemies' perception of the world... for about 8 seconds.

It's still enough time to escape.
book.arcanus.discombobulate.title: Discombobulate Spell Book
book.arcanus.dream_warp.description: Utilizing planar travel, you can "teleport" home to escape even the most awkward of dinner parties.
book.arcanus.dream_warp.title: Dream Warp Spell Book
book.arcanus.heal.description: Call upon magical energy to heal wounds quickly. This spell is useful when in a pinch.
book.arcanus.heal.title: Heal Spell Book
book.arcanus.lunge.description: This spell will launch you forward with enough force to hurt anything you collide with.
book.arcanus.lunge.title: Lunge Spell Book
book.arcanus.magic_missile.description:
Creates a fast moving, low damage projectile of magical energy.

A valuable tool in any Mage's arsenal.
book.arcanus.magic_missile.title: Magic Missile Spell Book
book.arcanus.solar_strike.description: Casting this spell will call down a beam of light from the Sun itself, incinerating most foes.
book.arcanus.solar_strike.title: Solar Strike Spell Book
book.arcanus.telekinetic_shock.descripti:
With a little magical assistance, this spell will send any foe (or friend) flying.

Just be careful with it around cliffs...
book.arcanus.telekinetic_shock.title: Telekinetic Shock Spell Book
commands.arcanus.spells.no_known_spells: %s doesn't know any spells. What a nerd!
commands.arcanus.spells.pattern_wrong_it: You must hold a Spell Page item to use this command.
death.attack.magic_burnout: %s found out what it feels like to be a mod developer
death.attack.solar_strike: %s got a severe sunburn while spending time with %s
death.attack.solar_strike.item: %s got a severe sunburn from %s using %s
error.arcanus.burnout: You're feeling a bit worn out...
error.arcanus.not_enough_mana: You don't have enough mana to cast this spell
error.arcanus.unknown_spell: You don't know this spell yet
item.arcanus.mana_flask.description: Drink to regain the stored Mana.
item.arcanus.mana_flask_empty.descriptio: Use while sneaking to fill with Mana.
spell.arcanus.cannot_interact: Unable to interact in that area
tooltip.arcanus.wand_upgrade: Cast more spells to level up your wand.
